name: User Attribute Values
description: The User Attribute Values Brightspace Data Set returns a list of all values for all defined user attributes for each user in your organization. If no user attributes are defined for your organization, the data set will not generate.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user who the attribute is assigned to.

columns.name: Value
columns.description: Value or list of values assigned to the user for the given attribute. Formatted as comma-separated values (CSV).

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date the attribute value was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified the attribute value.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the attribute value is deleted (TRUE - 1) or not (FALSE - 0).

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which row occurred first.
